translation.en: ♪ Twelve forever ♪
♪ Endless Island, Endless dreams ♪
♪ Twelve forever ♪
♪ Endless Island, Endless dreamer ♪
♪ Na, na You know it, you know it ♪
♪ Na, na You know it, you know it ♪
♪ Twelve forever ♪
♪ Endless Island, Endless dreams ♪
♪ Twelve forever ♪
♪ Endless Island, Endless dreamer ♪
[Todd, Judy and Dustin] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
-[Judy] Happy birthday, Reggie! -[Todd] Happy birthday.
Can't believe my little Reggie's all grown up!
I'm not that grown up.
Battle Snake Melissa would kill for some frosting!
translation.ko: 배틀 스네이크 멀리사가 케이크를 먹고 싶대!

translation.en: Todd, surrender your cake to Melissa!
Melissa, are you sure that's a good idea? I know you're pre-diabetic.
translation.ko: 멀리사, 과연 좋은 생각일까? 너 당뇨전증이잖아

translation.en: Battle Snake Melissa doesn't listen to doctors' orders!
translation.ko: 배틀 스네이크 멀리사는 의사의 말을 듣지 않아!

translation.en: All right, cool. I like a woman who plays by her own rules.
translation.ko: 그래, 알았어 주관이 뚜렷한 것도 좋지

translation.en: Wow! You guys are so cool.
I know. More cake, please!
-[Todd chuckles] -Mom, can I go now?
-No. -Ugh.
Uh-oh! [gasps] What's this under here?
-It's birthday presents! -[gasps]
Hey, good thing we're having a garage sale tomorrow,
otherwise there'd be no room for all of these.
Oh, my gosh, I hope I get a Corporate Battle Snake Melissa.
translation.ko: 세상에, 코퍼레이트 배틀 스네이크 멀리사를 갖고 싶어

translation.en: It's like regular Battle Snake Melissa, but with a suit.
-Oh, I get it! Like a corporate snake. -Huh?
Um, corporatism isn't funny.
If you don't watch out, it'll eat your soul.
All right, enough soul eating and more present opening.
Oh! Here, open mine first.
-Ooh, another Todd mix CD. -It's a special birthday edition.
translation.ko: - 또 다른 믹스 CD네 - 생일 특별판이야

translation.en: Dar Far Scar, Loose Hairs, the Razor Dents...
translation.ko: 다 파 스카, 루즈 헤어 레이저 덴트...

translation.en: Whoa, I don't know any of these bands.
Nobody does! But they're rad.
Except for one. I just threw 'em in there to keep ya guessing.
translation.ko: 한 곡만 빼고 그게 뭔지 듣고 맞춰 봐

translation.en: -Thanks, dude. -[Dustin] Here.
Oh, cool. A $20 gift card to Taco Chad's.
translation.ko: 아, 좋다 타코 가게의 20달러짜리 기프트 카드네

translation.en: Yeah, there's like seven bucks left on it.
Here, Reg. This one's from me.
Oh, wow! It's really... nice.
Yeah, isn't it?
I thought maybe you'd want to start wearing some nicer stuff.
translation.ko: 네가 예쁜 옷을 입고 싶을 거 같아서

translation.en: The other girls at your school always look so cute.
Deodorant? Mom, is this a joke gift?
Reggie, come on. It's practical. Besides, it's "desert pearl" scented.
translation.ko: 레지, 실용적인 선물이잖니 향도 좋은 거로 골랐어

translation.en: -It's fancy. -[sighs]
Oh! Oh, you're really gonna like this one!
Yes! This totally has to be Corporate Battle Snake Melissa!
translation.ko: 좋아, 코퍼레이트 배틀 스네이크 멀리사일 거야!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh!
Why are you being so shy? Let's see it. [gasps]
Look how cute! It even has little robots on it!
translation.ko: 너무 귀엽지? 작은 로봇 무늬도 있어!

translation.en: [groans] The party is over.
Finally. I'll be in my room.
[sighs] Reggie, what's goin' on?
[Reggie] You didn't get me anything I asked for.
Come on, Reg. We talked about how this birthday was gonna be a little different.
translation.ko: 이러지 마 이번 생일은 조금 다를 거라고 했잖니

translation.en: [Reggie] Yeah, but I just thought--
You're growing up and you don't need so many toys.
[Reggie] But--
You're gonna have to make room for these types of things eventually.
I mean, come on. This stuff's fun, too. It's just fun in a different way, ya know?
translation.ko: 고개 들어 봐 이런 물건도 재밌어 즐기는 방식이 다를 뿐이란다

translation.en: I don't know, I like this thing. I feel very supported.
Wow, you're really clearing house.
Hey, you got any gas pills in that box? These Butterflakes are doin' me dirty.
translation.ko: 상자에 배앓이 약 없어? 과자 먹은 게 얹혔나 봐

translation.en: Oh, these are all of Reggie's old things.
This stuff's been collecting dust for years.
I'm sure she won't mind letting it go.
Ugh, Chewing Gum Stanley. I remember when she made this guy.
translation.ko: 씹던 껌 스탠리네 레지가 직접 만들었지

translation.en: Just as disgusting as the last time I saw him.
Ugh, this thing's seen better days.
[chuckles] Yikes! Looks like my ex-husband.
[chuckles] Kathy, you're bad! How much should I sell it for?
translation.ko: 캐시, 그런 말 마요! 이걸 얼마에 팔지?

translation.en: Throw it out. If it gets some kid sick, the parents could sue you.
translation.ko: 그냥 버려 샀다가 애가 아프면 부모가 고소할 거야

translation.en: Trust me, Judy. I've been sued four times.
translation.ko: 믿어도 돼 난 네 번 고소당했지

translation.en: Hey! That's Brown Roger! What are you doing with my stuff?
translation.ko: "무료" 엄마, 브라운 로저잖아요! 내 물건으로 뭐 해요?

translation.en: We're just setting up for the garage sale tomorrow.
Are you for real? You're giving away my oldest, dearest friend?
translation.ko: 정말이에요? 내 오랜 절친을 거저 준다고요?

translation.en: He's been stuffed in the garage for months.
Yeah, because he likes dark spaces.
There! How would you feel if I gave away your best friend?
translation.ko: 보세요, 엄마의 절친을 거저 주면 어떻겠어요?

translation.en: Judy, am I your best friend?
Ugh. Reggie, these are just material possessions.
Once you let them go, you'll really evolve as a person, like I did.
translation.ko: 집착을 버리면 더 나은 사람이 되지, 나처럼 말이야

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What about Mr. Ratty?
What? Um... Oh, yeah, whatever. Just a piece of plastic.
I don't even care about him... it. I don't even care about it.
translation.ko: 걔한테 관심 없어 아니, 그거에 그거에 관심 없어

translation.en: Um, the only thing is, this is actually a collector's item.
I could get you more money if you let me sell it online or something.
translation.ko: 온라인에서 팔면 돈을 더 받을 수 있어요

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
[scoffs] I'm not worried! Go, sell it. I don't care! Pfft!
translation.ko: 걱정 안 해요! 마음대로 파세요 난 신경 안 써요

translation.en: Okay, listen, Reggie.
You can have one more day to go through your things.
But only keep what you absolutely can't live without, okay?
translation.ko: 하지만 반드시 필요한 것들만 추려야 한다

translation.en: [chuckles] Hey, look, $2,000,000.
If you guys sell this, you'll be living on easy street.
translation.ko: 이걸 팔면 저택에 살 수 있지

translation.en: Todd, be careful with that label maker. It jams up easy.
translation.ko: 토드, 라벨기 조심해 쉽게 고장 나거든

translation.en: -Sorry, Ms. Abbott. -[Reggie groans]
Oh, come on, I can help you go through everything. It'll be fun.
translation.ko: 내가 물건 정리를 도울게 재미있을 거야

translation.en: Remember what a good time we had going through that dumpster
looking for that $20 bill I lost? And then I got tetanus?
translation.ko: 쓰레기통 뒤질 때 재밌었잖아? 내가 파상풍에 걸리긴 했지만

translation.en: Yeah, that was fun.
-[Kathy grunting] -[Judy] Kathy, are you choking? Butterflake! Wrong pipe!
I can't do the Heimlich on you every week.
[Kathy choking] I have a small trachea!
[Reggie] What's my mom's problem?
I don't know, man. Adults are obsessed with getting rid of things.
Look at this stuff. It's all so beautiful.
translation.ko: 여기 좀 봐 하나같이 너무 아름다워

translation.en: [gasps] Remember Mack and Beefhouse?
Oh, yeah, of course. The most buff couple in the world.
translation.ko: 그야 당연하지 세계 최고의 근육 친구들이잖아

translation.en: [chuckles] And Flaps? That dude we came up with who spits out weapons?
translation.ko: 플랩스도 있지 입에서 무기를 뱉는 친구야

translation.en: That's, like, priceless art. We can't throw it out.
What's your mom's label maker doing in here?
I had to take it away. It was making her crazy with power.
translation.ko: 내가 없애야겠어 물건을 팔 때 쓰잖아

translation.en: [grunts] I hate this stupid thing and its stupid labels it spits out all stupid!
translation.ko: 라벨기는 바보 같아 멍청한 라벨이나 뱉어 내지

translation.en: -Did that make you feel better? -No.
Mom said I can only keep what I can't live without,
translation.ko: 엄마가 꼭 필요한 것만 고르라고 했는데

translation.en: but that's, like, everything.
I can't get rid of any of this.
And I'm not going to.
Come on, little guys, we're going on a trip.
What are you doing?
What do you think? We're taking this stuff to Endless!
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 맞춰 봐 엔드리스에 가져가는 거야!

translation.en: We'll hide it there and it'll be safe forever.
-Oh, yeah, that's a great idea! -Time to have some real fun!
translation.ko: 맞아, 좋은 생각이다! 제대로 즐길 시간이야!

translation.en: Yeah, let's go get weird to make up for your sad birthday party.
translation.ko: 슬픈 생일 파티를 잊도록 신나게 놀아 보자!

translation.en: With this key, create a door to take me to your righteous shores.
translation.ko: 이 열쇠로 문을 내어 너의 해변으로 인도하라

translation.en: Give us fun when there was none and make reality undone.
translation.ko: 상상과 재미 넘치고 현실은 멈추는 곳

translation.en: To the edges of infinity, Endless Island, set us free!
Hello...
-[gasps] -...Endless!
[sighs] Gets more beautiful every time I see it.
Oh, cool! It knows your age.
translation.ko: 완전 멋지다! 네 나이를 아나 봐

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I guess I'm 12 now.
All right, let's go find a place to stash this stuff.
-[Reggie] Yeah! -[all exclaiming]
We missed you!
Aw, I missed you guys!
-[Gorbis] Yoo-hoo! -Yoo-hoo! Oh, Twelve!
-Hi, Swimple Dan! Hi, Gorbis! -Hi!
I learned a new birthday trot just for you! I watched a tutorial.
translation.ko: 생일맞이 춤을 배웠어 널 위해서지! 동영상을 보고 연습했어

translation.en: -Psst! Todd! I need your help! -What's up, man?
I forgot it was Twelve's birthday. I don't have a gift! What do I do?
translation.ko: 트웰브의 생일을 깜빡했어 선물이 없는데 어쩌면 좋지?

translation.en: I'm really freaking out!
-And... -Voilà.
-Don't worry about it, Colin. -Hey, guys!
Twelve, I swear I got you a present! It's, um... It's in the mail.
translation.ko: 트웰브, 네 선물을 준비했어! 근데 배달 중이야!

translation.en: It hasn't come yet, but I'm gonna go check my PO box.
translation.ko: 아직 안 왔는데 우편함을 확인해 볼게

translation.en: -[Tasty Troy] Hey, Twelve. -Tasty Troy!
I have an extra special gift for you. It's better than everyone else's.
translation.ko: 네게 줄 특별한 선물이 있어 최고의 선물이 될 거야

translation.en: -Oh, wow! -Sweet! Did you make this?
Uh, what do you think happened?
Whoa! Thanks again, buddy!
I love you, Twelve. Yeah.
-Twelve! -Hey, Galaxander.
What an absolute delight. I have a gift for you. Gaze into my chest.
translation.ko: 만나서 정말 반가워 네게 줄 선물이 있어 내 가슴을 들여다봐

translation.en: Okay.
Oh, wow. Is that me?
Oh, uh, you know,
I haven't seen you in a few weeks so I sorta forgot you had hair.
translation.ko: 몇 주 동안 널 못 봐서 머리카락이 있는 걸 까먹었어

translation.en: Oh, no, you totally captured my aura.
Oh! Who is that lumpy child on your back? Is he your son and may I meet him?
translation.ko: 그런데 등에 있는 아이는 누구야? 네 아들이라면 소개해 줄래?

translation.en: Oh, that's my backpack. It's full of priceless treasures!
translation.ko: 이건 내 책가방이야 값진 보물들로 가득하지!

translation.en: Enchanting.
Ugh! What's this stupid thing doing in here? I didn't mean to bring this.
translation.ko: 이 멍청한 기계가 왜 여기 있지? 가져올 생각도 없었는데

translation.en: Well, you know what we gotta do? Chuck it.
translation.ko: 그럼 처리 방법은 뻔하네 던져 버려

translation.en: Great idea, Todd! Galaxander, please step aside.
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이야, 토드! 갤럭산더 옆으로 비켜 줄래?

translation.en: I'm about to serve some justice.
Gather 'round! Twelve is going to chuck something!
translation.ko: 다들 모여! 트웰브가 뭔가를 던져 버린대!

translation.en: -Wow! -I love when Twelve chucks things!
How fortunate to bear witness to her mythic strength!
[Swimple Dan] Oh, yes, she's very strong!
I once saw her karate chop a hole through a mountain.
translation.ko: 난 트웰브가 가라데 동작으로 산에 구멍 내는 것도 봤어

translation.en: She helped me open this pickle jar that was really stuck.
translation.ko: 꼼짝도 안 하던 피클 병을 단번에 열었다니까

translation.en: She also saved my marriage.
Remember to shield your eyes
if you're going to stare directly at her immense power.
translation.ko: 트웰브의 놀라운 힘을 직접 확인하려면 말이지

translation.en: -[all cheering] -Good job!
-Did that make you feel better? -You know what? It really did.
translation.ko: 이제 기분이 좀 나아? 있잖아 이번엔 성공이야

translation.en: [Judy] Was I too hard on Reggie?
She seems pretty upset about getting rid of her stuff.
translation.ko: 자기 물건을 없앤다니 애가 화났나 봐요

translation.en: Nah, kids these days have too many toys. You're doing her a favor.
translation.ko: 아니, 요즘 애들은 장난감이 너무 많아, 잘하는 거야

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, when I was her age, I was so excited to start wearing makeup,
translation.ko: 맞아요, 제가 그 나이 때는 화장하느라 정신이 없었죠

translation.en: and all I wanted to do was chase boys around
and hang out with my friends at the mall.
Oh, yeah. I remember those days. Those were my best huntin' years.
translation.ko: 맞아 나도 그런 때가 있었지 내 생애 최고의 시기였어

translation.en: Reggie just locks herself in her room for hours,
making up stories and drawing and living in her own little world.
translation.ko: 이야기를 쓰고 그림을 그리며 자기 세상 속에서 살아요

translation.en: I just don't get it. Oh, well.
Why do I have a whole box of half-melted candles?
translation.ko: 왜 반쯤 태운 초가 한 상자나 있는 거지?

translation.en: Who cares? You got a lot of freaks living on this street.
Someone will buy it.
What do you think? $1.50 for the set? Hey, where's my label maker?
translation.ko: 얼마로 할까요? 모두 1.5달러? 라벨기가 어디 있지?

translation.en: All right, where should we hide the stuff?
translation.ko: 좋아, 내 물건을 어디에 숨기면 좋을까?

translation.en: I don't know.
-Where should we hide the stuff? -[vocalizing] I don't know.
♪ Where should we hide the stuff? ♪ [both] ♪ I don't know ♪
♪ Where should we hide the stuff? I don't know ♪
♪ Where should we hide the stuff? I don't know ♪
-♪ Where should we hide the stuff? -[Soda Bug vocalizing]
-Did someone say hide? -Ah! Colin!
[laughs] If you're lookin' to hide some things, you could bury it in the sand.
I've buried things that ain't no one ever seen again.
translation.ko: 내가 뭔가를 묻은 뒤로 아무도 그걸 보지 못했지

translation.en: Like what?
Yeah, yeah, yeah, let's bury 'em!
Whoa! Wait! Don't you want your birthday present? It's paper towels.
translation.ko: 잠깐만! 생일 선물 안 받아? 키친타월이야

translation.en: Everyone loves a... Oh, who am I kidding? Never mind.
translation.ko: 누구나 좋아하는... 말도 안 되는 소리 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: Come on! Gimme a hand.
[grunts] Stand back. I got this. It's hole-diggin' time.
translation.ko: 물러서 있어 나한테 맡겨 봐 그럼 모래를 파 볼까?

translation.en: Aw, Brown Roger! I can't let you get covered with sand.
translation.ko: 브라운 로저! 널 모래에 묻을 순 없지

translation.en: You come with me.
Nice.
-Sweet burying, dude! -Just one of my many talents.
translation.ko: - 실력이 대단하네 - 내 능력 중 하나지

translation.en: Um, excuse me? Miss Twelve? We wrote a birthday song for you.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 트웰브, 우리가 널 위해 생일 축하 노래를 만들었어

translation.en: Aw, that's so sweet.
If you could come over here?
Make yourself comfortable! Okay, sit.
Why, thank you.
Wow, this program looks really promising.
And now, an original song by Pretty Please...
translation.ko: 노래를 만들고 부르는 이는 프리티 플리즈와

translation.en: -Tater Tot! -And Beth!
[Pretty Please] Okay. Hit it, Garrett!
♪ It's the birthday song It's the birthday song ♪
translation.ko: 생일 축하 노래야 생일 축하 노래야

translation.en: ♪ It's the birthday song It's the birthday song ♪
translation.ko: 생일 축하 노래야 생일 축하 노래야

translation.en: How long do we have to listen to this?
I don't know. Let's just give it a couple of minutes.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 몇 분 더 들어 보자

translation.en: A couple of minutes?
♪ It's the birthday song It's the birthday song ♪
♪ It's the birthday song It's the birthday song ♪
Uh...
[Beth] Garrett! You're covering my choreo!
-Is that-- -Oh, my gosh, is that Flaps?
How are you... What?
Twelve! Come play with me!
-[Beth] Bad Garrett. -Stop! [Garrett] I just wanted to do it, too...
translation.ko: - 나쁜 개릿 - 나도 같이 부르고 싶어

translation.en: Flaps, wait! What the... Who stole my stuff?
translation.ko: 플랩스, 잠깐만! 저게 뭐야? 누가 내 물건을 훔쳤지?

translation.en: Oh, hey, girl.
Oh, my gosh, Chewing Gum Stanley? Bag of Marbles?
translation.ko: 세상에, 씹던 껌 스탠리? 구슬 봉지?

translation.en: Oh, hi!
[Reggie] Mermaid Johnson? Other Bag of Marbles?
translation.ko: 인어 존슨? 또 다른 구슬 봉지?

translation.en: No relation.
-How is this happening? -I don't know!
[Mack] Hey, Twelve!
Happy birthday, kiddo.
-Mack and Beefhouse! -[Mack] Get over here.
-Best birthday ever! -Wow, this is a world-class hug.
translation.ko: 최고의 생일이에요! 와, 세계 최고의 포옹이네요

translation.en: Well, I am professionally trained.
Wow, look at this place. It's like paradise.
translation.ko: 우와, 여기 정말 멋진데? 마치 천국 같아

translation.en: And we've been to Paradise.
Remember that little bed and breakfast we stayed at in Sedona?
Oh, those cinnamon rolls! Oh!
Have you guys ever made the drive down to Sedona?
translation.ko: 차를 타고 세도나를 달려 본 적 있니?

translation.en: -No, we can't really drive. -Yeah, we're children.
translation.ko: 아니요 저희는 운전 못 해요 네, 아직 어리죠

translation.en: Wait. Why didn't Brown Roger come to life?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 브라운 로저는 왜 살아나지 않지?

translation.en: Hmm. Maybe you have to bury things here for them to come to life.
Cool, let's try it.
Um, how long do you think it takes?
I don't know. Pizza bagels take, like, what, four minutes in the microwave?
Four minutes?
Well, that's the perfect amount of time for me to tell you about my marbles.
translation.ko: 그 정도라면 내 구슬을 소개하기에 완벽하겠어

translation.en: I got a blue, red, green. I got a clear.
translation.ko: 파랑 구슬과 빨강 구슬 초록 구슬이 있고 투명한 구슬도 있어

translation.en: I even got a couple of sparkly ones if you look in the back.
Oh, my gosh, it worked! Come here, buddy!
And you don't smell bad. [sniffs] Well, not as bad.
Todd, meet one of my oldest friends, Brown Roger.
translation.ko: 토드, 오래된 내 친구 브라운 로저야

translation.en: I've had him since I was three.
Hey, little guy. It's a pleasure to meet--
-[Brown Roger hisses] -Whoa! Okay, I don't think he likes me.
Of course he does! He's the sweetest little angel in the world.
translation.ko: 그럴 리 없어! 세상에 둘도 없는 천사인걸

translation.en: [Reggie] Whoa, is that Mom's label maker?
Well, that's just too dang big.
Uh... Hey, man, welcome to Endless.
-Come join the party. -[Label Maker Monster growls]
-Oh, my gosh. -What the heck, man?
-[Todd] Whoa! -Ah!
Bag of Marbles! No!
-Ooh! Here you go. -I'm okay!
What's your problem?
I've never seen anything like this on Endless.
Listen up, Label Maker! I was willing to give you a chance,
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 라벨기! 네게 기회를 주려고 했지만

translation.en: but if you're gonna be a bully, then you've got to go! So what'll it be?
translation.ko: 다른 이들을 괴롭힐 거면 이곳을 떠나! 어떻게 할 거야?

translation.en: We gotta take him down before he wrecks this place!
translation.ko: 여길 망치기 전에 콧대를 꺾어 주자!

translation.en: -Todd, flank him from behind. -I'm on it!
Flaps, please tell me you can actually spit out weapons.
translation.ko: 플랩스, 입에서 무기를 뱉어 낼 수 있니?

translation.en: I sure can.
[grunts] Whoa, yeah, nice!
Oh, geez, he's really strong! I don't know how long I can hold him!
translation.ko: 이런, 힘이 너무 세 오래 버티진 못 하겠어

translation.en: Twelve, you're doing really good at fighting.
What are you... Run!
Oh, right. Thanks, Twelve!
I can't get close enough. Flaps, give me something long range!
translation.ko: 가까이 못 가겠어 플랩스, 장거리 무기를 줘!

translation.en: Here ya go.
Oh, no! He's got her cornered.
-[grunts] Flaps, gimme something else! -Here you go.
translation.ko: - 플랩스, 다른 무기 줘! - 여기 있어

translation.en: Oh, no.
Leave her alone!
Let's get him!
Piledriver! [grunting]
Submission hug! [grunting]
-Stop being so mean! -Yeah, you meanie!
translation.ko: 못된 짓 그만해! 이런 나쁜 놈!

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -No! Leave them alone!
[all whimpering] ♪ It's the birthday song It's the birthday song ♪
translation.ko: 생일 축하 노래야 생일 축하 노래야

translation.en: This is all my fault. [grunting]
Flaps! Hit me!
-Hey, Label Maker. Leave my friends alone! -Huh?
Bag of Marbles, set me up!
Quick, get away from him!
Wait, why did that explode?
I don't know. Maybe it was full of gasoline?
-[all exclaiming] -[Mack] Thanks a lot, Twelve.
I feel a lot safer.
Thanks for saving us!
Of course. I'll never let anything happen to you. I promise.
translation.ko: 당연히 그래야지 항상 너희를 지켜 줄 거야 약속할게

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, buddy. I can't take you with me.
translation.ko: 미안해, 친구 넌 데려갈 수 없어

translation.en: Once we bring things here, they can't come back with us.
translation.ko: 여기 오면 다신 돌아갈 수 없지

translation.en: So this is your new home. But we'll be back all the time.
translation.ko: 여기가 새로운 보금자리야 대신 자주 올게

translation.en: We'll take care of you, buddy.
Oh, of course we will! What a sweet little angel!
-See ya soon, Brown Roger! -[Brown Roger growls]
-Why? -Bye, everyone. We love you.
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? - 잘 있어, 모두 사랑해

translation.en: Twelve! Twelve, wait! I have your birthday present.
It's really good. I painted a picture of us.
I worked really hard on it. Oh, forget it!
Hmm. Birthdays are nice.
Hmm, knew it.
translation.ko: "우리 곁의 파충류 인간" 이럴 줄 알았어

translation.en: -[Reggie] Hey, Dustin? -What do you want?
I, um... I snuck Mr. Ratty out of the garage sale.
translation.ko: 그게... 미스터 래티를 몰래 챙겼어 오빠가 좋아할 거 같아서

translation.en: -I thought you'd want him. -Um... Okay, whatever.
translation.ko: 미스터 래티를 몰래 챙겼어 오빠가 좋아할 거 같아서 어쨌든 알았어

translation.en: Night, Dustin.
♪ Brown Roger I will always protect you ♪
translation.ko: 브라운 로저 영원히 널 지켜 줄게

translation.en: -[knock at door] -[Judy] Knock, knock.
Did you decide what you want to keep?
Yeah, um, actually, I decided to get rid of all of it.
Hey, that's great. Look at you being so mature.
I'm not mature.
Okay, okay.
Well, I was thinking since your birthday wasn't quite what you expected,
translation.ko: 네 생일이 기대에 미치지 못한 거 같으니까

translation.en: how about tomorrow I take you and Dustin to that gross pizza place you like?
translation.ko: 내일 오빠랑 네가 좋아하는 피자 먹으러 갈래?

translation.en: [gasps] Greasy Pete's Trash Pizza?
Oh... That's the one. Good night, dear. Proud of you.
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 잘 자, 레지 넌 내 자랑이야

translation.en: I'm proud of me, too.
